title: Biden, South Korea's Yoon vow to deter North Korea while offering COVID aid
content:
1. Biden, South Korea's Yoon vow to deter North Korea while offering COVID aid  Reuters
  2. Biden bungles South Korean President Yoon Suk-yeol's name  New York Post
  3. Biden begins Asia tour aimed at boosting Indo-Pacific ties  Al Jazeera English
  4. Biden's trip to South Korea may spark a new friendship  The Hill
  5. Opinion | As Biden heads to Asia, Russia's invasion of Ukraine, and China's woes, offer the US an opportunity in the region  The Washington Post

localize.title: バイデン氏と韓国のユン氏は、COVID援助を提供しながら、北朝鮮を抑止することを誓った。
拜登和韩国的尹恩惠发誓要威慑朝鲜，同时提供COVID援助
